import React, { Component } from 'react' import TourPackageService from '../services/TourPackageService' class UpdateTourPackage extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state={ packageName:'', description:'', daysCount:'', nightsCount:'', packageType:'', hotelName:'', tripPrice:'' } } updateTour = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('tour => ' + JSON.stringify(this.props.location.state.tour)); TourPackageService.updateTour(this.props.location.state.tour.packageId,this.props.location.state.tour).then( res => { window.alert("Tour Package Updated Successfully!") }); } cancel(){ this.props.history.push('/tour/all'); } changeHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }) } render() { return (


Update Tour

) } } export default UpdateTourPackage
